meta.description: The GGF's comprehensive toolkit for implementing governance frameworks

subtitle: Your comprehensive toolkit for bringing governance frameworks to life

overview.title: The GGF's Operating Manual
overview.intro: Visionary frameworks fail without practical, adaptable tools. This meta-framework provides standardized playbooks, modular tools, and culturally adaptable methodologies for implementing all other GGF frameworks.

assessment.title: Context Assessment
assessment.description: Interactive rubric to evaluate your governance maturity, resources, and cultural context

journeys.title: Journey-Based Tools
journeys.description: Curated toolkits for different stages: Getting Started, Crisis Response, Building Capacity

cultural.title: Cultural Adaptation
cultural.description: Anti-colonial design with Indigenous co-creation protocols and cultural translation tools

modular.title: Modular Design
modular.description: Mix and match tools like Lego blocks to create customized implementation stacks

info.statusDescription: This framework is under active development. Core tools are being field-tested by early adopter communities.
info.involvementDescription: Join our pilot testing program or contribute tool adaptations for your cultural context.

assessment.title: Context Assessment Rubric
assessment.description: Evaluate your context to receive personalized tool recommendations

journeys.title: Implementation Journeys
journeys.description: Choose your path based on your situation and goals

tools.title: Tool Database
tools.description: Explore our comprehensive library of implementation tools

stacks.title: Tool Stacks
stacks.description: Pre-configured tool combinations for common scenarios

guidance.title: Implementation Guidance
guidance.description: Best practices and lessons learned from global implementations

phases.title: Implementation Phases
phases.foundationDesc: Council convening, BAZ formation, crisis response capabilities
phases.integrationDesc: Economic modeling, participatory processes, system coordination
phases.evolutionDesc: Consciousness development, AI symbiosis, graceful transitions

cta.title: Ready to Start Implementing?
cta.description: Join our community of practitioners and start building better governance today.
